TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Vakangan, title = Vakangan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vakangan} }

S.FORM: Vakangan Itiniay i Yanping Cen no Taitung ko Vakangan a niyaro', 140 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 516 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 96% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 493 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 4% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 23 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bunun85%, Amis4%, Paiwan2%, Cou1%, roma2%.

Vakangan Itiniay i Yanping Cen no Taitong ko Vakangan a niyaro', 140 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 516 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 96% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 493 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 4% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 23 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bonon85%, Amis4%, Paiwan2%, Coo1%, roma2%.
